entry.title: Photos Post 34: Special Events (after 1975), Part 74
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 50 Photos of the special event 1978-0204 Pūjā, New Delhi, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolution and 15 medium/high resolutions from the Named Collections and 34 medium/high resolutions from the XYZ Known Collection.
The direct link to the 50 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1978.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 16: Handwritings, Part 17
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 jpgs of 1975-0508 Letter, Set 2 have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolution from the XYZ Unknown Collections.
The direct link to the 4 jpgs of the letter in the smallest gallery of handwritings: Handwritings 1975 to 2012.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!
